author: Bingham & Sabatier via Stephen Trussel and Gordon
notes: A Combined Kiribati-English Dictionary based on the works of Hiram Bingham, D.D. and Father Ernest Sabatier, M.S.C. (translated by Sr. M. author: right
glottocode: the right, the right hand of, right handed

author: to come
glottocode: róko means also; see Bender et al. (2003) given as \come

author: to know, be knowledgeable
glottocode: to know, to be aware of, to understand

author: to fear
glottocode: not sure of -kina bit here, but Bender et al. (2003) give ma-aku 'afraid' and ma-aka 'fear s/one', so I've coded as cognate

author: to fear
glottocode: not sure of -kina bit here, but Bender et al. (2003) give ma-aku 'afraid' and ma-aka 'fear s/one', so I've coded as cognate

author: to sniff, smell
glottocode: to smell or scent an odour

author: to sniff, smell
glottocode: to smell or scent an odour

author: mouth
glottocode: teeth, tooth, mouth, beak, point, needle

author: tooth
glottocode: teeth, tooth, mouth, beak, point, needle

author: to suck
glottocode: to smack lips, to taste, to suck

author: to stand
glottocode: to stand up, to get up

author: rope
glottocode: string, rope, cord; Pn loan - JCM

author: to steal
glottocode: to steal, to rob, to cheat

author: stick/wood
glottocode: wood in general: trees, plants, stick, switch, rod,

author: to grow
glottocode: to shoot up, to spring, to grow

author: to squeeze
glottocode: to squeeze, to press to extract juice

author: to buy
glottocode: to buy, to sell, to trade - Eng? - JCM

author: to pound, beat
glottocode: pound as food with a pestle

author: to throw
glottocode: to cast at, to throw at

author: tail
glottocode: the base, the butt end, the buttocks, the tail

author: fish
glottocode: fish (general term), fish of any kind

author: branch
glottocode: [<] Pn; looks like a loan from Polynesian

author: sand
glottocode: beach sand, sand bank, sandy soil

author: sky
glottocode: heaven, the blue sky, the skies

author: to blow
glottocode: a. to blow as the wind;

author: to blow
glottocode: b. to blow on, to blow out

author: big
notes: also' is the purported cognate - JCM"

author: new
glottocode: Bender et al. (2003:292) suggest this is a loan from a Polynesian source

author: to hide
glottocode: to cover oneself, to hide oneself

author: to climb
glottocode: b. ascend, climb as a mountain

author: to count
glottocode: to count, to calculate, to enumerate, to spell, to read

author: Twenty
glottocode: twenty in counting fish and rolls of dried pandanus paste
